Module Engine
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/Engine/Classes/Engine/NetDriver.h
Include #include "Engine/NetDriver.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (Abstract, CustomConstructor, Transient, MinimalAPI, Config=Engine)  
class UNetDriver :  
    public UObject ,  
    public FExec

Variables

  Type Name Description    
TSet< FObjectReplicator * > AllOwnedReplicators      
TSharedPtr< FNetAnalyticsAggregator > AnalyticsAggregator Special analytics aggregator tied to AnalyticsProvider - combines analytics from all NetConnections/PacketHandlers, in one event    
TSharedPtr< IAnalyticsProvider > AnalyticsProvider The analytics provider used by the packet handler    
int32 BadPingThreshold The point we think the host is cheating or shouldn't be hosting due to crappy network    
uint32: 1 bClampListenServerTickRate      
uint8: 1 bCollectNetStats Collect net stats even if not FThreadStats::IsCollectingData().    
uint8: 1 bHasStandbyCheatTriggered Used to determine whether we've already caught a cheat or not    
uint8: 1 bIsPeer If true then client connections are to other client peers    
uint8: 1 bIsStandbyCheckingEnabled Used to determine if checking for standby cheats should occur    
uint8: 1 bMaySendProperties      
uint8: 1 bNeverApplyNetworkEmulationSettings If true this NetDriver will not apply the network emulation settings that simulate latency and packet loss in non-shippable builds    
uint8: 1 bNoTimeouts If true, ignore timeouts completely. Should be used only in development    
uint8: 1 bSkipClearVoicePackets      
uint8: 1 bSkipLocalStats If true, it assumes the stats are being set by server data    
uint8: 1 bSkipServerReplicateActors      
bool bTickingThrottleEnabled Indicates whether ticking throttle is enabled for this instance of NetDriver    
TMap< FName, FChannelDefinition > ChannelDefinitionMap Used for faster lookup of channel definitions by name.    
TArray< FChannelDefinition > ChannelDefinitions Used to specify available channel types and their associated UClass    
TArray< TObjectPtr< UNetConnection > > ClientConnections Array of connections to clients (this net driver is a host) - unsorted, and ordering changes depending on actor replication    
TUniquePtr< PacketHandler > ConnectionlessHandler Serverside PacketHandler for managing connectionless packets    
float ConnectionTimeout Amount of time to wait before considering an established connection timed out.    
FDDoSDetection DDoS DDoS detection management    
bool DebugRelevantActors Dumps next net update's relevant actors when true    
TMap< FNetworkGUID, TUniquePtr< FActorDestructionInfo > > DestroyedStartupOrDormantActors The server adds an entry into this map for every actor that is destroyed that join-in-progress clients need to know about, that is, startup actors.    
float GracefulCloseConnectionTimeout Amount of time to wait for a graceful close/bPendingDestroy to complete before considering the connection timed out.    
TSharedPtr< class FNetGUIDCache > GuidCache

float InitialConnectTimeout Amount of time to wait for a new net connection to be established before destroying the connection

uint32 InPacketsLost The percentage of incoming packets that have been found to be lost.

uint32 InTotalBytes Total bytes in packets received since the net driver's creation    
uint32 InTotalPackets Total packets received since the net driver's creation    
uint32 InTotalPacketsLost Total packets lost that have been sent by clients since the net driver's creation    
uint32 InTotalReliableBunches Total number of incoming reliable bunches    
float JoinInProgressStandbyWaitTime The amount of time to wait before checking a connection for standby issues    
float KeepAliveTime      
double LastCleanupTime Time of last netdriver cleanup pass

TArray< TWeakObjectPtr< AActor > > LastSentActors

int32 MaxClientRate      
int32 MaxDownloadSize      
int32 MaxInternetClientRate      
int32 MaxNetTickRate Limit tick rate of replication to allow very high frame rates to still replicate data.

uint32 NetGUIDOutBytes Outgoing rate of NetGUID Bunches

FDelegateHandle OnLevelAddedToWorldHandle

uint32 OutPackets The number of packets per second that have been sent.    
uint32 OutPacketsLost The percentage of outgoing packets that have been found to be lost.

uint32 OutTotalBytes Total bytes in packets sent since the net driver's creation    
uint32 OutTotalPackets Total packets sent since the net driver's creation    
uint32 OutTotalPacketsLost Total packets lost that have been sent by the server since the net driver's creation    
uint32 OutTotalReliableBunches Total number of outgoing reliable bunches    
FPacketSimulationSettings PacketSimulationSettings      
float PercentForBadPing The number of clients with bad ping before triggering the standby code    
float PercentMissingForRxStandby The number of clients missing data before triggering the standby code    
float PercentMissingForTxStandby      
FDelegateHandle PostTickDispatchDelegateHandle      
FDelegateHandle PostTickFlushDelegateHandle      
uint32 PrevInPackets The number of packets that were received in the previous frame.    
uint32 PrevInPacketsLost The number of incoming packets that were found to be lost in the previous frame.    
uint32 PrevOutPackets The number of packets that were sent in the previous frame.    
uint32 PrevOutPacketsLost The number of outgoing packets that were found to be lost in the previous frame.    
float ProcessQueuedBunchesCurrentFrameMilliseconds Tracks the amount of time spent during the current frame processing queued bunches.    
uint8: 1 ProfileStats      
TArray< FDisconnectedClient > RecentlyDisconnectedClients Tracks recently disconnected client IP's, and the disconnect time - so they can be cleaned from MappedClientConnections    
int32 RecentlyDisconnectedTrackingTime The amount of time, in seconds, that recently disconnected clients should be tracked    
float RelevantTimeout      
FProperty * RemoteRoleProperty      
TMap< FName, FName > RenamedStartupActors The server adds an entry into this map for every startup actor that has been renamed, and will always map from current name to original name

FString ReplicationDriverClassName      
uint32 ReplicationFrame Used to invalidate properties marked "unchanged" in FRepChangedPropertyTracker's    
FNetDriverReplicationSystemConfig ReplicationSystemConfigClient Can be used to configure Client settings for the ReplicationSystem    
FNetDriverReplicationSystemConfig ReplicationSystemConfigServer Can be used to configure Server settings for the ReplicationSystem    
FProperty * RoleProperty      
int32 SendCycles Timings for Socket::SendTo()    
FOnSendRPC SendRPCDel Delegate for hooking ProcessRemoteFunction    
TObjectPtr< class UNetConnection > ServerConnection Connection to the server (this net driver is a client)    
float ServerTravelPause Amount of time a server will wait before traveling to next map, gives clients time to receive final RPCs on existing level    
FShouldSkipRepNotifies SkipRepNotifiesDel Delegate for hooking ShouldSkipRepNotifies    
float SpawnPrioritySeconds      
float StandbyRxCheatTime The amount of time without packets before triggering the cheat code    
float StandbyTxCheatTime Todo document    
TWeakPtr< StatelessConnectHandlerComponent > StatelessConnectComponent Reference to the PacketHandler component, for managing stateless connection handshakes    
float StatPeriod Interval between gathering stats    
double StatUpdateTime Time of last stat update    
FDelegateHandle TickDispatchDelegateHandle Handles to various registered delegates    
FDelegateHandle TickFlushDelegateHandle      
float TimeoutMultiplierForUnoptimizedBuilds A multiplier that is applied to the above values when we are running with unoptimized builds (debug) or data (uncooked).    
uint32 TotalRPCsCalled Total RPCs called since the net driver's creation    
int32 TotalTrackedGuidMemoryBytes      
TSet< FObjectReplicator * > UnmappedReplicators

uint32 VoiceOutPercent Tracks the voice data percentage of out bound bytes
